President Joe Biden has said he is hopeful that America can "mark independence" from Covid-19 on 4 July if people get vaccinated.

articles.description: In his first prime-time speech, the US president says he is boosting efforts to vaccinate Americans.
articles.title: Covid pandemic: Biden eyes 4 July as ‘Independence Day’ from virus - BBC News

articles.content: (CNN)Covid-19 numbers may be on the decline in the United States after a year of collective grief. But with tens of thousands of deaths expected over the next few months, experts are warning American… [+4705 chars]
articles.description: Covid-19 numbers may be on the decline in the United States after a year of collective grief. But with tens of thousands of deaths expected over the next few months, experts are warning Americans not to drop their guard just yet.
articles.title: Here's why experts say the US may be fooled by improving Covid-19 numbers and what that means for the summer - CNN
